name: Helastel
tagline: Reliable and diligent You are in safe hands.
description:
We offer web development, web app and site design, software development, system integration, e-commerce and e-learning from online ticketing for major attractions, to the system that lets the UK’s traffic signs talk to each other, to safety-critical e-learning for pilots. 
We’re trusted with some of the country’s most precious data. Our visual learning and communication system is helping 40% more diabetes sufferers manage their condition in partnership with the NHS.
